verses.name: Numbers 33:13
verses.text: And they departed from Dophkah, and encamped in Alush.

verses.name: Numbers 33:14
verses.text: And they removed from Alush, and encamped at Rephidim, where was no water for the people to drink.

verses.name: Numbers 33:15
verses.text: And they departed from Rephidim, and pitched in the wilderness of Sinai.

verses.name: Numbers 33:16
verses.text: And they removed from the desert of Sinai, and pitched at Kibroth–hattaavah.

verses.name: Numbers 33:17
verses.text: And they departed from Kibroth–hattaavah, and encamped at Hazeroth.

verses.name: Numbers 33:18
verses.text: And they departed from Hazeroth, and pitched in Rithmah.

verses.name: Numbers 33:19
verses.text: And they departed from Rithmah, and pitched at Rimmon–parez.

verses.name: Numbers 33:20
verses.text: And they departed from Rimmon–parez, and pitched in Libnah.

verses.name: Numbers 33:21
verses.text: And they removed from Libnah, and pitched at Rissah.
